abstract: The Clear Sky Droid app for Android devices presents the authoritative astronomical information found on the Web site ClearDarkSky.com
snippet: The Clear Sky Droid app for Android devices presents the authoritative astronomical information found on the Web site ClearDarkSky.com
lead_paragraph: Last week's App Smart column identified a few great apps for tracking meteor showers.

headline.main: App Smart Extra: Starry, Starry Night
